short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export and Import items from cart and displays retail prices next to dealer prices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension 

1. Implements the ability to export and import the products to the cart
2. Shows retail prices next to dealer prices and calculates the percentage difference

Exports are made in csv format and can be opened and edited by:

* Google Sheet
* Microsoft Excel
* Open Office Calc

After editing, you can import items back to your cart using the import function. 

The extension adds Export and Import buttons to the cart page. You can find them under the list of products.  

The retail prices will be shown in the product list, under the discount line. In order to see retail prices, log in with your dealer account. Then click on the extension icon in the list of extensions and enable the "Enable retail prices" checkbox. Reload the page, wait a moment and you will see retail prices above the main price.
